name: BlackThorne Keep Chronicles
description:
"Thommas BlackThorne is the last heir of the BlackThorne,
a once noble family of the northernmost edges of the empire.
The family castle, the BlackThorne Keep is a ruin of the ancient forgotten
glory and a reminder of what was lost. When his family lands are
given to a new noble , Thommas needs to travel south to find his older
brother that decided to dedicate his life to the church - and deliver
the news of the Fate of the BlackThorne."

Hi! My name is Roberto Garcia and I'm the founder of the BlackThorne Keep gaming community and writer of the PARAGONIA RPG, a low fantasy tabletop RPG that takes place in a world akin to  16th century Europe and Americas. I've been passionate about gaming and RPGs for all my life and studied Screenwriting, Cinema and Filmmaking. 

In 2020, with the COVID-19 pandemic, I had the opportunity to start learning Unreal 4, and decided to turn all my years of gaming and RPGing into something new: a BlackThorne Keep ARPG with next gen technology - gathering all the stories of friends and foes along these years of online and analog gaming to create an original electronic Action RPG.

And that's why I'm on itch.io! Here I intend to gather the enthusiasts of this world and genre to help fund the project, while keeping a line open with the people interested.

That said, it's important to make clear that this is not (yet) a product. If you decide to contribute to the project and buy the game in its current form, please understand that you're not buying a final product - it's far from that! The objective at this point is to gather a community to help bring this vision to life, and if you’re looking for customer support or a fully developed experience, don't buy it now. Hopefully in a few years you will be able to get a fully realized product - no hard feelings!

Now, if you're interested in the project and want to help make it real, please do! At this point, I'm doing all of the development alone, learning code and buying assets from artists, and this kind of stuff is not cheap. All funds gathered here will be used to further develop the game and enhance it.

And this is just getting started! I hope I can count on your support.

BlackThorne Keep Chronicles is set on a new world called Paragonia, based on the RPG setting I've been working for almost 20 years. The setting we will be exploring in the game is called The Old Empire, a region of the world where the struggle for power have divided a once great nation into several rival kingdoms and city-states.

The first part of the Story Campaign takes place in a place called the Black Forest, named after a millennia old clan structure often called The Blacks. Several of the known noble families of the current Sherath Kingdom trace back to the original "Blacks" and are now known as BlackOaks, BlackStenius, BlackBriars, BlackThorne etc, changing names and lands over the centuries. The Blacks resisted the first incursion of the empire, but were eventually conquered and assimilated to the nobility.

First draft of Black Forest - North Map

One of the planned game modes is a Campaign Mode that will introduce the world setting and tell the story of the BlackThorne, a once noble family that fell from grace and is now gauging their way trough the opulence of The Old Empire.


What Is the BlackThorne Keep
The BlackThorne were once lords on the edges of the empire, ruling the region commonly known as BlackForest North. Their ancient castle, the BlackThorne Keep is now a ruin - a tale of pride and decadency.  Originally built to dominate the region and keep the savage clans at bay, the keep was overrun by the Iron Helm clan, the very same savages it was supposed to master. Seeing no other solution, the BlackThorne Lord at the time sapped his own castle and destroyed it. Even though he rooted out the savages back to the mountains, it cost him his castle, his title and his family glory.

Decades later, the Northern BlackForest is a place almost forgotten by the empire. The only town there is in all aspects a frontier town and works as a commercial hub for the folks that live in the region.

The remaining BlackThorne live now in one of the remaining farms of the Castle era - the lands that were not taken from their ancestral that destroyed his own Keep. No longer nobles, not yet accepted by the common folk, the BlackThorne live at the shadow of their glorious past - often recalled of their fall by the shadow of the opulent ruined castle at the edge of their lands.

(WORK IN PROGRESS)

The game in its currently state is playable, but it is in EARLY stages, what one could call Early Access. Even though it has a lot of its building blocks in place, it should be considered very heavy Work in Progress in ALL areas. 

Current features (Work in Progress):
-Melee Combat 
-Open World exploration
-Horse Riding 
-Quest System
-Arena Game mode for Combat Testing

Currently being implemented:
-New Main Menu system
-Character Sheet
-Local and World Map

Planed Features:
- Story Heavy campaign
- Game Modes: Story Campaign, Free Roam and Arena
- Character Creation for Free Roam Mode and Co Op
- Co Op gameplay up to 4 players (4 players in Free Roam mode and 2 on Campaign Mode)
- Loot and Resources (for survival gameplay)
- Camping feature

**The list of planed features might be changed if any supervening issue arise. **
